headline: NiSource Inc (NI) Q1 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Strong EPS Growth and Strategic Investments
summary: NiSource Inc (NI) reports a 15% increase in adjusted EPS and reaffirms its growth outlook, driven by strategic capital investments and productivity gains.
